Title: Establishes an awareness campaign on the use of hormone replacement therapy in treating the symptoms of perimenopause and menopause
Summary: Establishes an awareness campaign on the use of hormone replacement therapy in treating the symptoms of perimenopause and menopause.
LawCode: Amd ยง207, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing an awareness campaign on the use of hormone replacement therapy in treating the symptoms of perimenopause and menopause
